___aliasOf.description: ID of the aliased reference. Note aliasing can be recursive.

$eref.description: Legacy, unstructured data. Please don't do this. Please help get it fixed: https://github.com/tobie/specref/issues/147

___status.description: What state a spec is in. Is it a work in progress, completed, etc.

___publisher.description: Name of the publisher if any.

___deliveredBy.description: An array of URLs pointing to the home page of the Working Groups working on the spec.

___obsoletedBy.description: Array of identifiers of specs which have replaced this one

___pages.description: Page number(s) where the reference is inside the titled document

___date.description: Date of publication in humand readable form, favor rawDate instead.

___versions.description: An object listing specific versions of that spec.

___aliases.description: This is for in internal use only and shouldn't be manually set.

___rawDate.description: A prefered, machine readable format (YYYY-MM-DD) to specify the date. Note month and day are optional.

$eref.definition: A reference ID (corresponds to RFCs or W3C shortnames).

___aliasOf.description: ID of the aliased reference. Note aliasing can be recursive.
